All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Actor
Parent class to all moving object in the game screen
Animal
Create the Animal object frogger which is controlled by the user in the game The frogger will get points in the game while moving forward The goal is to reach all the Ends The frogger may die due to car crash or sunk in water
BackgroundImage
Set up the background of each scene with respective background image
Button
Create Button for starting the game, info page, each game level
Choose
The choose level screen with each game level buttons added on it
Controller
Scene controller that store all screens and activate the respective one according to command
Digit
The display of high score in the game screen
End
The End object which is the goal of the frogger
Info
Info page containing control information about the game
Level
Parent class to all game level class Adding Animal to the game Start the game Prompt alert message when game ends showing high score
Level1
Setup the obstacles for each row in game level 1
Level10
Setup the obstacles for each row in game level 10
Level2
Setup the obstacles for each row in game level 2
Level3
Setup the obstacles for each row in game level 3
Level4
Setup the obstacles for each row in game level 4
Level5
Setup the obstacles for each row in game level 5
Level6
Setup the obstacles for each row in game level 6
Level7
Setup the obstacles for each row in game level 7
Level8
Setup the obstacles for each row in game level 8
Level9
Setup the obstacles for each row in game level 9
LevelFactory
Construct a game level
Log
Create a Log floating on water as platform for the frogger
Main
The main class that launches the application Create start screen, info screen, choose level screen and each game level object and add them into the Controller screenMap
Music
Play the music while game starts and stop the music while game ends
Obstacle
Create Obstacle moving on road such as Car and Truck which will cause carDeath if the frogger crashes them
Score
Score class that takes in the high score from respective text file and compare to current score Update the high score list when current score makes into the list
Start
Create a start screen with starting background and buttons to launch the game and read information about the game
Turtle
Create a Turtle with swimming animation on the water as platform for the frogger
WaterPlatform
Parent class to Log, Turtle and WetTurtle which are objects on the water
WetTurtle
Create a WetTurtle with animations of swimming and sinking on the water as platform for frogger
World
The root node that every display object attaches to
